peril.ai.api

Interface Board

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelBoard

    public interface Board
    Provides information about the board which consists of many Continents and Countrys. This board cannot be altered.
    Since:
    2018-02-06
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends Continent> getContinents()
      Retrieves all the Continents on this Board.
      java.util.Set<? extends Country> getCountries()
      Retrieves all the Countrys on this Board.
      int getNumberOfCountries()
      Retrieves the number of Countrys on this Board.

    • Method Detail

      • getContinents

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,? extends Continent> getContinents()
        Retrieves all the Continents on this Board.
        Returns:
        Map<String,? extends Continent> where the key is the name of the Continent.

      • getNumberOfCountries

        int getNumberOfCountries()
        Retrieves the number of Countrys on this Board.
        Returns:
        number of Countrys

      • getCountries

        java.util.Set<? extends Country> getCountries()
        Retrieves all the Countrys on this Board.
        Returns:
        Set<? extends Country>
